settings.title: Service & Help
settings.header-body: Many faults, error patterns or anomalies can be quickly and easily remedied by yourself. In most cases, you can then use your coffee machine again directly and do not have to send it to our repair centre. Here you will find tips on the quickest and best solution.

settings.question: How to descale my machine?
settings.answer:
Turn on machine
Fill water tank with descaling solution and water all the way to the max line
Put your water tank back into your machine and start the descale (power & espresso button together)
Place a 32oz pitcher under the spout and click the blinking espresso button 
Water should start to run in intervals 
Once the machine has filled the 32oz, remove tank and pitcher (do not wait for refill water sign)
Empty the pitcher and place it back under spout
Empty tank out, rinse and fill with clean water, place back into machine
The machine should automatically start rinsing 
It will rinse out 24oz in two intervals
- It will rinse 12oz, stop for 60 seconds, and rinse the remaining 12oz 
When finished it will enter rest mode
Turn machine back on and it should be ready to brew!
